Articles.Content: I'm trying to model my EMPT or Electro Magnetic Plasma Thruster and I don't know how to model it in blender I got it modeled in Sketchup Make right now and I was wondering if someone could model it in blender for me its a 2.5m engine that has an estimated thrust of 3000kN. any body u models it for me in blender I greatly appreciated. heres what it looks like in Sketchup: [http://imgur.com/QVMOzb8](http://imgur.com/QVMOzb8) [http://imgur.com/FIfSsMh](http://imgur.com/FIfSsMh)
